original_title: The Fall of Communism as Seen in Gay Pornography
overview: Every image in The Fall of Communism as Seen in Gay Pornography comes from gay erotic videos produced in Eastern Europe since the introduction of capitalism. The video provides a glimpse of young men responding to the pressures of an unfamiliar world, one in which money, power and sex are now connected.
title: The Fall of Communism as Seen in Gay Pornography
